title: Last minute gift alert! Windows 11 Pro is now under $25 with no shipping required
content:
Macworld

There are less than two weeks until Christmas. Still have some shopping to do? Then consider giving digital gifts that don’t require shipping — like this lifetime license to Windows 11 Pro, now only $24.97 (reg. $199) until December 25.

Windows 11 Pro can take your giftee’s PC to the next level. Equipped with enhanced security and performance features, it’s an OS ideal for enterprise and consumer applications. For greater privacy and safety, it offers biometrics login, TPM 2.0, Smart App Control, BitLocker Encryption, advanced antivirus defenses, and much more.

This user-friendly OS also provides virtualization technology so users can simultaneously run multiple operating systems on one computer, as well as business-oriented features like Windows Hello for Business and Group Policy Management. 

A huge addition to Windows 11 Pro is Windows Copilot, an AI-driven assistant that helps users change settings, summarize text, and more. It also offers vital updates to the Paint app so users can enjoy AI-powered tools like background removal, content creation, PNG support, and enhanced image editing.

Even better, your giftee can install Windows 11 Pro on up to two PCs. They just need at least 4GB RAM and 40GB of hard drive space for successful installation.

This holiday season, gift a loved one an upgrade in productivity and security.

Grab a lifetime license for Microsoft Windows 11 Pro for just $24.97 through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. No coupon required!
